title: when adc-senpai says you're a good support

replies.body:
I've always viewed it the other way around.

The support wears the pants in the relationship, and the ADC has to live up to the supports expectations. xD

> [{quoted}](name=AbyssionKnight,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2eKH0AeY,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2014-12-24T23:01:48.442+0000)
>
> I've always viewed it the other way around.
> 
> The support wears the pants in the relationship, and the ADC has to live up to the supports expectations. xD


I find that it's the supports that think that way, while the ADC's think they're tough shit. 
And you have the hardened supports, just looking down in disdain at all of the different ADC's, usually making some sort of judgement just based on which champ they picked. Is it the flavour of the week ADC~? Is it an OP ADC? Is it Urgot? Just like that, judgements are made~ LOL.

This is why it is so great when an ADC recognizes you're good at what you're doing. It means he understands his role just as well as you understand yours. ADC realizing support exists and is helping them and they should play with the support instead of being Leroy Jenkins is exactly what I expect out of an ADC.
if a support is good, I will complement them, if they are bad i either give them tips or don't say anything. end of story

Having played substantial amounts of both rolls, the support definitely wears the pants, they're the lane shot callers. Sure ADCs can go "that enemy is alone in lane, we can jam on them and get a kill", but about 65% of the time that ends in something between a bad trade and one or two deaths. I've died like that as a carry more times than I'd like to admit, and seen carries do that countless times.
well you think about it adc's all they do is just stand there and auto... supports are the ones that allow them to just stand there and auto so yeah supps def more important.

yeah them new supports pretty broken.
Hard to not preform above average with most of them
Nami thresh braum
Lordy, those kits and base stats.

> [{quoted}](name=ImHerVoice,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2eKH0AeY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-24T13:18:05.116+0000)
>
> yeah them new supports pretty broken.
> Hard to not preform above average with most of them
> Nami thresh braum
> Lordy, those kits and base stats.

It's almost like there's a 5th player.

Disgusting, I know.

I remember when league was 4v4.
What prompted to add this 5th, I have no idea.

Alistar's been my pick since s1, Never had an issue actually existing in a game since the first day I played him.
But Ok.
Ya know, needy kids need to have broken stats+ champions+items to be noticeable.
RIP top laners/jungler then right?
All their items suck unless they're a sabre abuser or someone thats actually viable to build a GA as a top laner.
Yet they still build tank for you because they're nice and want to win just as much as anyone else
The feels are real.
Nice to see you again

i always get noticed by adc senpai

because thresh can make them plays that impresses all the adc's
i know how you feel… but most of the time if you get the adc fed they're just like "GG EZ" and ignore the support :c at least, from my experiences

> [{quoted}](name=KawaiiPotato,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2eKH0AeY,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2014-12-26T20:51:27.543+0000)
>
> i know how you feel… but most of the time if you get the adc fed they're just like "GG EZ" and ignore the support :c at least, from my experiences

  lol ok then you are not a good support if you can't get them to say WOW your not trying hard enough just practice and you will make them say WOW adc mains  have easier times supporting i guess because you have to kite  and protect them use  if you can't make them say wow you haven't done your job well enough
2/0/29 thresh by 30 minutes, Lol okay

> [{quoted}](name=KawaiiPotato,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2eKH0AeY,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-28T02:40:06.323+0000)
>
> 2/0/29 thresh by 30 minutes, Lol okay

well then your adc is a dick we all have games like that in aram i was 16/1/25 as nami it was my first time nami

I loves me a good Thresh player. Even if I don't get kills, if I know he saved my ass more times than I care to admit, he did his job more than admirably. I envy support mains because I know I'm not good enough to do it unless I'm queued with a friend of mine. Seriously, support mains are a blessing to people like me who can play a carry fairly well, but can't support someone I don't know :\
I lol'd
raka is pretty damn good now too
In mine case.  "Fuc**** FINALY! It was about time!"

Haha 
http://www.deviantart.com/art/hang-on-Teemo-344438693
We try.

{{summoner:31}} - am I kawaii
damn it, you know the answer to that already, you adorable ball of fluff
No, i am kawaii.
ahahahha freakin lost it
